nodes.text: Veemo was a Human male officer in the Republic Navy during the Galactic War. In the year 3643 BBY, Veemo was a vendor who could be found on the frozen ice planet of Hoth.

Officer Veemo appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Veemo was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
